# WEEK 2: Mental Architecture

**Write 250 words each day.**  
**Due: Sunday, April 20, 2025 at 11:59 PM**

## Day 1 — Monday, April 07, 2025

Mental Architecture — Compare your internal thinking patterns to one of the computational models introduced this week.

## Day 2 — Tuesday, April 08, 2025

Processing Speed — Reflect on a time when your brain felt “slow” or “laggy.” How did it feel physically, emotionally, intellectually?

## Day 3 — Wednesday, April 09, 2025

Cognitive Debugging — Identify a recurring mental “glitch” or bias you’ve noticed in yourself. Where might it come from?

## Day 4 — Thursday, April 10, 2025

System Overload — Write about a moment you felt cognitively overwhelmed. What processes failed? What self-corrections emerged?

## Day 5 — Friday, April 11, 2025

Neuroimpression — Choose one course reading and describe the emotion or cognitive shift it caused in you.
